html:
3.13.18  1:53 am   what do u do when you just REALIZE ALL YOUR FLAWS

      realize everyone else's, too

3.13.18  12:58 am   should i come here for capitalization tutoring or your twitter?

     i suggest using whatever capitalization you dream of

3.13.18  12:47 am   Any particular reason why you wanted a "questions" (ueqstions) page?

     i thought it would be a fun and enjoyable learning experience, for everyone but especially me

3.12.18  11:57 pm   what super power do you choose

     being normal

3.12.18  11:35 pm   Have u ever kicked ur own ass?

     time and time again

3.12.18  11:33 pm   do you write lyrics or the instrumental first?

     no way

3.12.18  11:17 pm   who is god

     everything

3.12.18  10:43 pm   how do you get everything that you need to do done without being completely overwhelmed

     do more

3.12.18  10:42 pm   do you need maths in everyday life

     i do

3.12.18  10:35 pm   So, what's the endgame here?

     it's choose your own ending

3.12.18  9:28 pm   i miss monday videos :(

     when i was doing monday videos, i was desperately missing all the other types of content i could do. by the way all the monday videos are still available, they did not leave

3.12.18  8:26 pm   what does intelligence mean to you

     being smart, that sort of thing

3.12.18  8:10 pm   help I forgot what question I asked you how do I remember?

     it was this

3.12.18  8:07 pm   Can you write me a song on commission?

     there is a long waiting list

      The commission is a really fun time

3.12.18  8:00 pm   Here is some advice. I advice you to not follow my advice. Would you follow my advice or not follow my advice.

     i did not follow it, not because you advised me not to, but on my own accord

3.12.18  7:33 pm   quick how do i use a keyboard

     press the buttons

3.12.18  7:00 pm   bad people often pretend to be good; but what about a good person pretending to be bad

     yes that happens on the silver screen

3.12.18  6:50 pm   Do Virginia license plates have nice colors?

     not that i know of

3.12.18  5:39 pm   if you add up all the time you've spent making videos, then divide that by the number of minutes of video you've made, what's the average time it takes you to make one minute of video?

     i haven't done those calculations

3.12.18  5:27 pm   Do you think you'd learn how to play the violin faster than most people?

     yes, if you are including non-musicians

      Or do you already know it?

     i know how they work but i don't think i have ever played one

     Have you ever broken a violin?

     no

     Has a violin ever broken you?

     no

      Have you ever broken a violin with your own body while also breaking yourself in the process?

     no

      Do you think they're cheap?

     some of them might be

3.12.18  4:48 pm   For those of you who have just tuned in, this is questions, with bill wurtz. Today, we have a special guest, the man himself: bill wurtz.

     i'm actually the only one who is not a guest here

     And the next question for him is:

3.12.18  4:23 pm   Is it possible to make a video that's under 1 second long? Or if you try to do that will pretty much every video-making program (or video-playing website) round it up to 1 second?

     you can make any length video you want. depending on where it's played, the time counter may have to round up or down to the nearest second, unless their time display can display smaller increments. but that wouldn't change the actual length of the video

3.12.18  3:21 pm   you're a doofus.

     fair enough

3.12.18  2:12 pm   is tightrope walking an art form?

     sure

3.12.18  1:29 pm   does each chord have its own distinct feeling to you on its own- example: you sit down at the keyboard and play D7. then you play Fmin11. they sound different but do they evoke any feelings to you if they are devoid of words or context?

     yes and it also depends when, where, and how you play them

     do you think that it's actually the relationship between chords when used in the context of a song (including words) that really (or potentially) induces the strongest feelings?

     if you're asking whether chords are a big deal in music the answer is yes

3.12.18  1:25 pm   what is the most serious you have been on you videos

     anything after about 2014 when i actually started making them constantly

3.12.18  12:59 pm   do you find jokes with ear rape of homocide unfunny or irritating.

     not as much as the real thing

      Like edgy things

3.12.18  12:19 pm   how to songwrite?

     make the whole damn thing up!

3.12.18  11:44 am   have you ever regretted being you?

     not quite

3.12.18  11:38 am   what do you think of mississippi?

     it's nice

3.12.18  11:29 am   why don't you answer your phone? mom

     because it's all fake robot spam with spoofed numbers

3.12.18  10:44 am   how are you going to celebrate pi day?

     work on the thing

3.12.18  9:56 am   What's your favorite meter?

     whichever one best represents the music at hand

      Mines 12/4 because it can be split up into 1, 2, 3, 4, or 6.

3.12.18  8:08 am   Hello, what do you think about France ? 

     it's hard to even comprehend how french that place is

3.12.18  7:31 am   Will the next video include the phrase "be (your) self"?

     no

3.12.18  6:54 am   how can you define 'reality' when there's no evidence that it's real?

     don't worry, you can define fake things too. even call them real, see if i care

3.12.18  4:46 am   can you explain how dividing by zero is subtraction? I don't get it

     if you want to divide something into zero pieces, you can divide the pieces all you want but at some point you will have to get rid of the pieces

3.12.18  3:28 am   do seals go bork

     they might

3.12.18  2:19 am   I really love how you respond to questions as sarcasticly as possible, and I hope to one day reach your level of sass. Do you have any tips on being sarcastic without losing your job/relationship/life?

     don't do it

3.12.18  1:46 am   3.11.18  10:22 pm Well I think there's an A7 before that last D chord.. which is a D7sus4?

     ah, that's more like it

3.12.18  1:16 am   Do you think I could make music with just FL Studio and a laptop Mic?

     sure

     Do you think it'd be worth listening to?

     it depends how you make it, where you put it, and the motivations of the person listening to it

      Would you listen to it?

3.12.18  1:10 am   thoughts on 2018?

     it's good

3.12.18  12:53 am   do you think about the law of diminishing returns a lot?

     not by that name but yes

3.12.18  12:15 am   What are your thought on daylight savings time that aren't "I think it could really take off" or something like that that you use to respond to opinion questions

     11.4.17  11:45 am, 11.7.16  2:10 am

3.12.18  12:14 am   Why didn't you mention the Philippines in HOTEWIG?

     i didn't mention everything because it's impossible to mention everything in the entire universe in a 20 minute video, especially if you expect to complete it in your life time, but the phillippines are in there

3.12.18  12:12 am   is digital art real art?

     yes

3.11.18  11:58 pm   How do you decide what makes it on to the song page when pretty much all of your videos (except for the reality vids) have music in them? I guess some of the instrumental, score-type stuff that is meant to specifically sync up to graphics might not stand alone as 'songs'.. but what about stuff like 'sometimes i stand in my room' 'how to be cool', david letterman', 'i hate myself', etc? Or even putting jingles on there (like 'live my life' from steve or 'lets go to africa and find love in the jungle', 'yep sure that's me' or 'if you find something in a box..' etc)? 

     it really just depends on whether i think the video was based on the song or the song was based on the video. if the video was based on the song then it goes on the songs page. if the song was made based on the video then it probably shouldn't be there

3.11.18  11:45 pm   is the next song in a minor key?

     no

3.11.18  11:16 pm   Would you consider yourself an average YouTuber?

     i'm not even a youtuber

3.11.18  10:51 pm   Are you ever awed at the unpredictability of the future?

     i have grappled with it before but i am rather comfortable with the whole thing by now
